attenuator.label: Attenuator
attenuator.description: Scales audio or CV levels down for tidy gain staging or subtle modulation depths.

bias-voltage.label: Bias Voltage
bias-voltage.description: Provides a steady DC offset that shifts other control voltages into the sweet spot.

chorus.label: Chorus
chorus.description: Multi-voice modulated delay that thickens pads and leads with silky detuning.

clipper.label: Clipper
clipper.description: Hard-limits peaks to add grit, distortion, or safety to loud sources.

clock-divider.label: Clock Divider
clock-divider.description: Derives slower, phase-aligned pulses by dividing the master clock.

clock-multiplier.label: Clock Multiplier
clock-multiplier.description: Multiplies an incoming clock to create faster subdivisions and ratchets.

comparator.label: Comparator
comparator.description: Emits a gate whenever an input CV crosses a voltage threshold.

crossfader.label: Crossfader
crossfader.description: Blends two sources with manual or CV control over the fade curve.

cv-attenuator.label: CV Attenuator
cv-attenuator.description: Trim control voltages before they hit sensitive destinations.

cv-attenuverter.label: CV Attenuverter
cv-attenuverter.description: Bipolar level control that both scales and inverts control voltages.

cv-inverter.label: CV Inverter
cv-inverter.description: Outputs the negative version of any control signal for mirror-image modulation.

cv-matrix-mixer.label: CV Matrix Mixer
cv-matrix-mixer.description: Four-by-four style matrix that routes multiple CV sources to multiple destinations.

cv-mixer.label: CV Mixer
cv-mixer.description: Simple summing mixer for combining modulation sources.

cv-mixer-attenuverting.label: CV Mixer (Attenuverting)
cv-mixer-attenuverting.description: CV mixer with bipolar knobs so every input can be inverted or boosted.

cv-mod-generic.label: CV Mod Utility
cv-mod-generic.description: General-purpose modulation block for offsets, scaling, or routing tricks.

cv-recorder.label: CV Recorder
cv-recorder.description: Captures CV gestures in real time and loops them back as automation.

cv-rectifier-full.label: CV Rectifier (Full)
cv-rectifier-full.description: Folds negative CV up into positive values, doubling the modulation frequency.

cv-rectifier-half.label: CV Rectifier (Half)
cv-rectifier-half.description: Blocks the negative half of a CV, yielding unipolar modulation.

cv-switch.label: CV Switch
cv-switch.description: Voltage-controlled switch for routing CV lanes or selecting modulation sources.

cv-utility-mixer.label: CV Utility Mixer
cv-utility-mixer.description: Precision mixer with offsets ideal for pitch CV summing and transposition.

delay.label: Delay
delay.description: Flexible delay line for slapbacks, dub repeats, or washed-out ambience.

env-ad.label: AD Envelope
env-ad.description: Two-stage attack/decay contour for percussive hits.

env-ad-loop.label: AD Envelope (Looping)
env-ad-loop.description: Looping AD envelope that turns into a simple unipolar LFO.

env-adsr.label: ADSR Envelope
env-adsr.description: Classic attack-decay-sustain-release generator responsive to gate length.

env-adsr-loop.label: ADSR Envelope (Looping)
env-adsr-loop.description: Self-looping ADSR for evolving rhythmic modulation without gates.

env-ahdsr.label: AHDSR Envelope
env-ahdsr.description: Adds a hold stage for organ-style swells and long pads.

env-ahdsr-loop.label: AHDSR Envelope (Looping)
env-ahdsr-loop.description: Looping AHDSR delivering complex five-stage modulation cycles.

env-ar.label: AR Envelope
env-ar.description: Simple attack/release contour suited for drones and amplitude shaping.

env-ar-loop.label: AR Envelope (Looping)
env-ar-loop.description: Looping AR envelope that behaves like a ramp LFO.

env-dadsr-loop.label: DADSR Envelope (Looping)
env-dadsr-loop.description: Cycling envelope with delay plus ADSR for staggered modulations.

env-dasdr.label: DASDR Envelope
env-dasdr.description: Delay–attack–sustain–decay–release contour for intricate percussion phrasing.

envelope-follower.label: Envelope Follower
envelope-follower.description: Turns audio amplitude into CV for ducking, tremolo, or dynamics tracking.

gate-delay.label: Gate Delay
gate-delay.description: Offsets gates or triggers by a programmable time before passing them on.

granular-synth.label: Granular Synth
granular-synth.description: Grain engine that scrubs through buffers to stretch, freeze, and cloud sounds.

inverter.label: Inverter
inverter.description: Flips an audio signal 180° to fight phase build-up or create negative mixes.

keyboard-ctrl.label: Keyboard Controller
keyboard-ctrl.description: Generates pitch CV, gates, velocity, and mod outputs from a keyboard.

lfo-bpm-saw.label: BPM LFO (Saw)
lfo-bpm-saw.description: Tempo-synced saw LFO for rising ramps locked to the clock.

lfo-bpm-sine.label: BPM LFO (Sine)
lfo-bpm-sine.description: Smooth sine LFO that follows the transport BPM.

lfo-bpm-square.label: BPM LFO (Square)
lfo-bpm-square.description: Clocked square LFO for choppy tremolo and rhythmic gating.

lfo-bpm-triangle.label: BPM LFO (Triangle)
lfo-bpm-triangle.description: Tempo-locked triangle LFO delivering even rises and falls.

lfo-reset-sync.label: LFO Reset Sync
lfo-reset-sync.description: Resets any free-running LFO to phase zero using triggers or clocks.

lfo-saw.label: LFO (Saw)
lfo-saw.description: Free-running sawtooth LFO for exponential risers or drop-offs.

lfo-sine.label: LFO (Sine)
lfo-sine.description: Classic sine LFO for smooth vibrato, PWM, or filter sweeps.

lfo-square.label: LFO (Square)
lfo-square.description: Binary square LFO ideal for trills, chops, and clock-style modulation.

lfo-triangle.label: LFO (Triangle)
lfo-triangle.description: Linear triangle LFO for even cyclical movement.

logic-and.label: Logic AND
logic-and.description: Outputs high only when every input gate is high.

logic-nand.label: Logic NAND
logic-nand.description: The inverse of AND—high whenever at least one input is low.

logic-nor.label: Logic NOR
logic-nor.description: Outputs a high gate only when all inputs are low.

logic-not.label: Logic NOT
logic-not.description: Simple inverter for gates and triggers.

logic-or.label: Logic OR
logic-or.description: Outputs high when any input gate is high.

logic-xnor.label: Logic XNOR
logic-xnor.description: Exclusive NOR: high when inputs share the same state.

logic-xor.label: Logic XOR
logic-xor.description: Exclusive OR: high when exactly one input is high.

lpg.label: Low-pass Gate
lpg.description: Combines VCA and VCF behavior for organic vactrol plucks.

master-clock.label: Master Clock
master-clock.description: Primary clock source with tempo, swing, and reset control for the whole system.

microphone-input.label: Microphone Input
microphone-input.description: Mic preamp with gain to bring external vocals or instruments into the rack.

mixer.label: Audio Mixer
mixer.description: Multi-channel audio mixer with level knobs for balancing voices.

mixer-inverting.label: Inverting Mixer
mixer-inverting.description: Audio mixer with polarity inversion for phase tricks and feedback control.

noise.label: Noise Generator
noise.description: White/pink noise source for percussion, wind, or modulation duties.

phase-shifter.label: Phase Shifter
phase-shifter.description: Modulated all-pass network that sweeps notches for classic phaser tones.

physical-mod-generic.label: Physical Modeling (Generic)
physical-mod-generic.description: General resonant model for mallets, hits, or abstract materials.

physical-mod-membrane.label: Physical Modeling (Membrane)
physical-mod-membrane.description: Membrane resonator suited for drums, toms, and stretched skins.

physical-mod-pipe.label: Physical Modeling (Pipe)
physical-mod-pipe.description: Pipe and tube resonator evoking flutes, organs, and metallic chimneys.

physical-mod-string.label: Physical Modeling (String)
physical-mod-string.description: String resonator for plucks, bows, and resonant drones.

precision-adder.label: Precision Adder
precision-adder.description: Precision adder that sums pitch CV while keeping 1V/oct accuracy.

quantizer.label: Quantizer
quantizer.description: Snaps incoming CV to musical scales, chords, or microtonal sets.

random-smooth.label: Random (Smooth)
random-smooth.description: Generates slowly fluctuating random voltages for wandering modulations.

random-stepped.label: Random (Stepped)
random-stepped.description: Outputs quantized random steps at each clock pulse.

rectifier-full.label: Rectifier (Full)
rectifier-full.description: Full-wave rectifier for audio: replaces negative polarity with positive.

rectifier-half.label: Rectifier (Half)
rectifier-half.description: Half-wave rectifier that mutes either the positive or negative lobe.

resonator.label: Resonator
resonator.description: Tunable resonant body for Karplus or sympathetic ringing tones.

reverb.label: Reverb
reverb.description: Room, hall, and plate style reverberation for spatial depth.

ringmod.label: Ring Modulator
ringmod.description: Multiplies two signals to create inharmonic sidebands.

sample-and-hold.label: Sample & Hold
sample-and-hold.description: Samples an input at trigger time and holds the value until the next pulse.

sample-player.label: Sample Player
sample-player.description: Plays back loaded audio files with CV control over pitch and position.

sample-rec.label: Sample Recorder
sample-rec.description: Captures incoming audio to buffers for later playback or mangling.

seq-cv-gate.label: CV/Gate Sequencer
seq-cv-gate.description: Programmable sequence lanes for pitch CV and gate patterns.

slew-limiter.label: Slew Limiter
slew-limiter.description: Glides between voltages at a set rate for portamento or smoothing.

speech-synthesis.label: Speech Synthesis
speech-synthesis.description: Formant-based speech synthesizer for robotic or spoken textures.

switch.label: Audio Switch
switch.description: Voltage-controlled switch for selecting between audio paths.

touch-ctrl.label: Touch Controller
touch-ctrl.description: Capacitive touch plate that outputs CV and gates from finger gestures.

trigger-pattern-generator.label: Trigger Pattern Generator
trigger-pattern-generator.description: Algorithmic engine that spits evolving trigger rhythms.

vca.label: VCA
vca.description: Voltage controlled amplifier for shaping amplitude or modulation depth.

vca-dc.label: DC-Coupled VCA
vca-dc.description: VCA that passes DC, perfect for CV level control.

vcf-bandpass.label: VCF Band-pass
vcf-bandpass.description: State-variable filter passing only a focused band of frequencies.

vcf-comb.label: VCF Comb
vcf-comb.description: Resonant delay-line filter for flanging, Karplus, and metallic tones.

vcf-highpass.label: VCF High-pass
vcf-highpass.description: Removes low frequencies while animated by cutoff CV.

vcf-highpass-res.label: VCF High-pass (Resonant)
vcf-highpass-res.description: High-pass filter with controllable resonance for acidic sweeps.

vcf-lowpass.label: VCF Low-pass
vcf-lowpass.description: Smooth low-pass filter for subtractive sculpting.

vcf-lowpass-res.label: VCF Low-pass (Resonant)
vcf-lowpass-res.description: Low-pass with variable resonance for squelchy bass and leads.

vcf-notch.label: VCF Notch
vcf-notch.description: Twin-notch or band-reject filter great for phasing effects.

vco-pwm.label: VCO PWM
vco-pwm.description: Voltage-controlled oscillator with pulse-width modulation for animated squares.

vco-ramp.label: VCO Ramp
vco-ramp.description: Saw/up-ramp oscillator with sync and FM inputs.

vco-saw.label: VCO Saw
vco-saw.description: Classic sawtooth oscillator rich in harmonics.

vco-sine.label: VCO Sine
vco-sine.description: Pure sine oscillator for FM, subs, and percussion.

vco-square.label: VCO Square
vco-square.description: Square oscillator with perfect odd harmonics and hard sync.

vco-triangle.label: VCO Triangle
vco-triangle.description: Triangle-core oscillator for mellow, low-harmonic tones.

vco-wavetable.label: VCO Wavetable
vco-wavetable.description: Sweeps through stored waveforms under CV for evolving timbres.

voltage-slider.label: Voltage Slider
voltage-slider.description: Manual CV fader for performance gestures and offsets.

wavefolder.label: Wavefolder
wavefolder.description: Adds harmonics by folding a waveform back onto itself.

waveshaper.label: Waveshaper
waveshaper.description: Nonlinear processor that remaps waves for distortion and dynamics control.
